alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Greene; Hancock; Jefferson; Morgan; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Warren, southeastern Morgan, central Putnam, Hancock, southern Greene, Glascock, central Washington, southwestern Taliaferro and Jefferson Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1144 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Carey to near Gough, and moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Sandersville, Greensboro, Louisville, Sparta, Gibson, Wrens, Wadley, Davisboro, Stapleton, Bartow, White Plains, Avera, Mitchell, Edge Hill, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Edgehill, Liberty, and Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Glascock; Greene; Hancock; Jefferson; Morgan; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren; Washington
